Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Toothless \Tooth"less\, a. Having no teeth. --Cowper. [1913 Webster]
toothless adj 1: lacking teeth; "most birds are toothless"; "a toothless old crone" [ant: {toothed}] 2: lacking necessary force for effectiveness; "a toothless piece of legislation"
